# from

**Instance Property**

Fetches sample information that occurs after this time.

## Declaration

```swift
var from: SRAbsoluteTime { get set }
```

## Discussion

A fetch is exclusive of this time.

The framework requires the app to define a value for this property. If an app fails to define this property, the framework responds to the fetch by providing [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRError/Code/fetchRequestInvalid] to the reader delegate via [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSensorReaderDelegate/sensorReader(_:fetching:failedWithError:)].

## Defining the Time Range

- **to**: Fetches sample information that occurs before this time.
- **SRAbsoluteTime**: A value that describes when the system records the data.
- **current()**: Provides the current absolute time.
- **toCFAbsoluteTime()**: Converts an absolute time to a core-foundation absolute time.
